name: Carrier Tycoon
summary: Step into the world of logistics mastery with Carrier Tycoon! Take control of a futuristic transport empire, managing fleets of ships, trucks, and planes to deliver goods across a bustling metropolis. Strategize routes, overcome challenges, and watch your business grow. Stunning visuals, dynamic gameplay, and endless possibilities await. Build your legacy as the ultimate tycoon in this immersive simulation. Are you ready to dominate the skies, seas, and roads?
